content: eugenia s mittens by mollie woodworth molliebatmit finished measurements 10 from cuff to tip 7 circumference at top of cuff gauge 20 sts/28 row = 4 in stockinette stitch in the round yarn 1 skein madelinetosh vintage in baltic mine used 164 yds 0 82 skein needles us 7 4 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge in your preference of circular knitting methods i am generally a tight knitter so be sure to swatch additional materials yarn needle scrap yarn for holding stitches stitch markers cuff co 40 sts join to work in round work in k2 p2 rib for 19 rounds next round working in pattern as established increase 1 st after every 5 sts for example from the beginning of the round k2 p2 k1 m1 k1 p2 k2 m1… 48 sts total hand work row 1-16 of chart over first 28 sts back of hand with stockinette st over next 20 sts palm you can place markers to delineate the back and palm if you wish if you are using magic loop or two circular needles this would be a great place to divide your stitches at the same time on row 5 of the chart begin the thumb gusset see below work row 1-8 then row 1-16 again work row 1-2 note this strange way of doing things started out as many cool things do as a mistake if you prefer to work row 1-16 twice then row 1-10 more power to you at this point the mitten should reach to about the bottom of the fingernail of the recipient s ring finger about 1 5-2 shorter than the full length of the mitten if it is too short keep knitting chart row until it s long enough thumb gusset on row 5 of chart begin increases for thumb gusset right mitten round 1 work row 5 of chart across first 28 sts place marker m1 place marker round 2 work next row of chart knit to end of round round 3 work next row of chart slip marker m1 knit to marker m1 slip marker round 4 work next row of chart knit to end of round repeat rounds 3 and 4 until there are 15 sts between the markers on next round slip these 15 stitches to a piece of scrap yarn knit to end of round left mitten round 1 work row 5 of chart across first 28 sts knit to end of round place marker m1 place marker round 2 work next row of chart knit to end of round round 3 work next row of chart knit across palm sts slip marker m1 knit to marker m1 slip marker round 4 work next row of chart knit to end of round repeat rounds 3 and 4 until there are 15 sts between the markers on next round slip these 15 stitches to a piece of scrap yarn mitten top round 1 *k4 k2tog* repeat from * round 2 knit round
